data.title: Tim Simpson, D.D.S.: Dentist Abilene, TX
data.meta_description: Tim Simpson, D.D.S. provides a range of dental solutions for convenient, personalized treatment. We offer sedation and accept multiple forms of financing.
data.text:
To improve your experience, we invite you to access our new patient welcome packet. You can also explore our before-and-after gallery to see what we can achieve together and watch our videos to learn more about what we stand for.

At Tim Simpson, D.D.S., in Abilene, TX, the care and comfort of our patients are of the utmost importance. As trusted dental professionals, Dr. Simpson and his team are committed to helping you restore, achieve, and maintain a beautiful smile through advanced cosmetic, restorative, and general dentistry, all from their conveniently located Abilene dental office.

We are recognized for our superior cosmetic dentistry services and are dedicated to providing you with individual, personalized attention because we recognize that each person's preferences, concerns, and dental needs are unique.

To maintain optimal oral health, dental experts recommend visiting the dentist at least once every six months. If it's been a while since your last dental checkup, or if you are interested in learning more about our advanced cosmetic and restorative procedures, we invite you to request an appointment at the practice of Tim Simpson, D.D.S., in Abilene, TX, today.

There are many reasons to choose us as your primary dental care providers in Abilene, including our:

Comprehensive Care

Friendly Team

Convenient Financing

Comfortable Office

We understand that patients often put off the dental care they need to live healthy, pain-free lives due to poor past experiences and the fear of dentists. We aim to change that.

With a gentle touch and sedation dentistry available, patients feel at ease when they entrust us with their care. Dr. Simpson and his entire team are friendly and approachable, encouraging patients to ask questions so they can make the most of their care. No matter your dental needs, we can provide you with an experience that transforms how you feel about dentistry.

Let's see what our team can do for you. We invite you to request a consultation at our Abilene office today.

Call: (325) 677-6553

At the practice of Tim Simpson, D.D.S., we hope to make our dental services as accessible to you as possible. We accept a variety of financial options to ensure that you can get the dental treatments you want and need. In addition to accepting most major credit cards, we also accept financing through third-party lenders, including CareCreditÂ® and First Financial Bank.
